excerpt: "Ride-share companies have launched mask checking technology in their apps to ensure drivers are abiding by new Covid-19 regulations. The Government announced m Uber today announced its Face Cover Check technology would be running in its app here to help confirm driver-partners were wearing a face cover or a mask before they could start driving with the app."
